original_text: And Samson grasped the two middle pillars on which the house rested, and he leaned his weight against them, his right hand on the one and his left hand on the other.
korean_text: 삼손이 집을 버틴 두 기둥 가운데 하나는 왼손으로 하나는 오른손으로 껴 의지하고

sentences.original_text: And Samson grasped the two middle pillars
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 삼손은 두 가운데 기둥을 붙잡았고

sentences.original_text: and he leaned his weight against them
his right hand on the one
and his left hand on the other.
